snippet: The Associated Press reports that the candidate has canceled her trip to South Carolina.
abstract: The Associated Press reports that the candidate has canceled her trip to South Carolina.
lead_paragraph: Representative Michele Bachmann of Minnesota has scheduled a news conference for 11 a.m. Eastern time in West Des Moines, after her sixth-place finish in Iowa's Republican caucuses on Tuesday. Mrs. Bachmann signaled that she would stay in the race after the vote last night; however, The Associated Press reported on Wednesday morning that she had canceledher planned campaign trip to South Carolina.

headline.main: Bachmann Holds News Conference in Iowa
